presentation.summary: Voice services
presentation.description: This state-of-the-art managed voice platform enables a fast and reliable enrollment of VoIP telephony in a way that enables users to be ready for new online technologies. It even integrates with your on-site switchboard.

Dit state-of-the-art managed voice platform faciliteert een snelle en betrouwbare uitrol van VoIP telefonie zodanig dat gebruikers klaar zijn voor nieuwe online technologieÃ«n. Het integreert tevens met uw bestaande PBX.

version.entry: Initial test release
Fixed auto-fill fields for seam-less install of account.
Fixed naming errors in documentation.
SSO mandatory fields are filled.
Split logging and tracing for verification and for configuration scripts.
Added Managed Voice.
Added Managed Voice structure.
Added Number structure.
Added NumberPorting structure
Added Line product structure
Added stubs for Mobile
Cleanup of comments
Removed mobile services (will be part of plug-in)
Subscription ID now part of all the Services (VWAPS-20)
Detection of business/personal account (VWAPS-21)
Managed Voice service flow complete (VWAPS-15)
Cleanup of services scripts and generalization.
Added IVR (VWAPS-18) and Queue (VWAPS-17) under Managed Voice
Finalized Channel service implementation (VWAPS-3)
Delegated authentication for the API added.
Separate feedback mechanism for debugging must be possible (VWAPS-42)
Number service finalized (VWAPS-4).
Lookup function for the Numbers via verify script added.
Numbers restricted to blocks of maximum size of 1.
Separate feedback mechanism for debugging must be possible (VWAPS-42).
Error_log shows up in the end user screens (VWAPS-41).
XSL files moving to a location where they can be loaded (VWAPS-40).
Naming of Number blocking entries incorrect (VWAPS-43).
Logging structure leads to errors on demo platform (VWAPS-22)
Finalize Manage Voice flow (VWAPS-13)
Bugfixes found in 1.0 fixed.
Path error in Number scripts fixed.
Added new Services for Hardware and for CallRecording
Porting resource script added for status feedback (VWAPS-12).
Porting service finalized (VWAPS-11).
Finalized Porting implementation (VWAPS-1)
Autofill of user login field by login value to fix unique username.
Cleanup of structure for Call Recording.
Empty fields check in verify scripts for excluding service execution (VWAPS-47)
Empty response message handling (VWAPS-46)
Managed Voice extension number cannot be changed (VWAPS-50)
Queue and IVR strategy 5 requires optional fields from the XSD (VWAPS-45)
Outcommented incomplete EWAN services, to plugin package.
Porting adjustments for billing.
International numbers added in APS.
Cleanup of unneeded settings from APS.
Duplicate message returned (VWAPS-66)
Phone number fields must be numeric only (VWAPS-69)
VWAPS-1 Add Porting scripts and settings to APS (VWAPS-11)
Billing Gateway Initial Release (VWAPS-5)
Empty response or incorrect XML responses from API must be handled (VWAPS-71)
Enable PLATFORM ID from global settings as prefix for the unique references (VWAPS-44)
Gespreksopname service in APS (VWAPS-54)
Hardware service added to the Account (VWAPS-55)
Porting flow testcase setup (VWAPS-10)
Split up services for Number ordering (VWAPS-60)
User service should be capable of handling an alternative e-mail address (VWAPS-64)
Porting pricing as a minor resource instead of via Billing Gateway (VWAPS-12)
Incorrect areacode handling (VWAPS-70)
Empty response for IVR and Queue services for certain combinations (VWAPS-65)
Update Queue leads to error (VWAPS-76)
International Number order webservice (VWAPS-61)
List of areacodes in Channel autofill (VWAPS-53)
International Number order webservice (VWAPS-58)
NumberBlock order service (VWAPS-62)
Service implementation for XMLAPI (VWAPS-67)
Webservice implementation of CallRecording service (VWAPS-59)
Variable user is encoded email address and is not recognized by BGW (VWAPS-83)
Number ranges in porting disappear (VWAPS-77)
Porting of 090x numbers fails on send (VWAPS-79)
Exclusion Mapping for billing fields that are handled in Parallels (VWAPS-7)
Internationalisation support (VWAPS-25)
Maintenance mode - block execution (VWAPS-52)
Numbers services need icons attached (VWAPS-74)
Fix making Regex values for input checking better substituting [0-9] by \d
Account subscription after provisioning does not fail, but stops (VWAPS-86)
Added extra error responses for porting
Updated generic response class to always respond with a generic response value
Account creation can be duplicate when automatically provision (VWAPS-87)
Missing required 'id' attribute for choice element (VWAPS-88)
List number request has errors if areacode is not good (VWAPS-89)
Porting number entry hidden fields do not need regex (VWAPS-93)
FaxIn/FaxOut validation can be called without the correct variable (VWAPS-95)
Error during creation of Managed Voice using non existent areacode (VWAPS-90)
Porting status visible in order form (VWAPS-92)
Error creating VoiceConnect (VWAPS-94)
Hashcheck error in previous release was not detected by Eclipse. Always clean build before.
Verify call on numberblock request is incomplete (VWAPS-99)
Invalid date field returned for Porting (VWAPS-96)
Handle extension already in use in configure (VWAPS-98)
Invalid channel user name (VWAPS-102)
Missing country number pricing for some countries (VWAPS-85)
Numberblock ordering error message on incorrect element (VWAPS-100)
User login credentials are not filled for the login (VWAPS-103)
Added latest XSD sets (VWAPS-106)
International number areacode choices are not updated (VWAPS-91)
Error response for createivr (VWAPS-97)
Verify update on account on API gives XSD validation error (VWAPS-105)
User login credentials are not filled for the login (VWAPS-103)
Platform name should be part of the unique reference for identification (VWAPS-49)
Reopened : Error during creation of Managed Voice using non existent areacode (VWAPS-90)
Wishdate for porting is mandatory now since empty fill is ambigious
International number inputs are filled but type not accepted (VWAPS-104)
Empty choice element with retrieval of areacodes in Numbers (VWAPS-108)
Voiceworks_User object not created (VWAPS-110)
Porting block request in the configuration call has no block (VWAPS-111)
Did not package updated NumberRangeUtil.php file in release 1.3-11 (VWAPS-113)
Login link for user is incorrect (VWAPS-114)
Update name in APS package to Voiceworks instead of VoiceworksAPS (VWAPS-115)
Remove default values in ServiceManager (VWAPS-116)
Upgrade path introduction in APS (VWAPS-117)
Found PHP compile error pushed thru build script
Refactored the 3 numbers services to 1 that can be reconfigured
Verify function does not detect error for Call recording (VWAPS-118)
Adjustments to ENUM fields for numbers (VWAPS-121)
User settings Alternative Email address is automatically selected (VWAPS-119)
Dropdown values implementation (VWAPS-120)
Made number selection field protected for test
Updated scripts to return field error messages after filling data (VWAPS-120)
Dropdowns should be of type string instead of enum (VWAPS-121)
User change username implementation (VWAPS-122)
Error handling input for numberblocks (VWAPS-123)
Updated scripts to return field error messages after filling data (VWAPS-120)
In certain cases error data is returned twice
Updated resources-list for updating
COC number and VAT can be hidden (VWAPS-131)
Naming inconsistency for numberranges (VWAPS-101)
Updated resources-list for updating
Porting number in progress does no blocks (VWAPS-125)
User change username implementation (fix on VWAPS-122)
Added test for protected item in dropdown that will be filled automatically
International locations with one areacode and number may proceed directly (VWAPS-135)
Faxnumbers allow entering of phone numbers starting with + (VWAPS-139)
Queue can accept an illegal extension number (VWAPS-138)
First and lastname can be prefilled automatically for user created (VWAPS-137)
Number related interaction needs to be described better for enduser (VWAPS-140)
Removed test for protected item in dropdown that will be filled automatically
Script error introduced in VWAPS-135
Check if numberblock is numeric (VWAPS-144)
No permission to make request (VWAPS-145)
Cleanup data from earlier tests
Check on status of VWAPS-137. Fields first and lastname are hidden now.
Incorrect password is sent for resource call to BGW (VWAPS-133)
Updated naming of billing resources to be consistent and added Dutch translations
Decoding of uuid for customernumber in the script
Cleanup
Bug in International numbers with multiple areacodes but one number only
Protected the International number selection from viewing
Porting status not updated (VWAPS-158)
Error ordering international numbers (VWAPS-152)
Change earlier selected areacode leads to errors (VWAPS-149)
Split up International numbers (VWAPS-157)
Script test for more flexibility for operator (VWAPS-157)
Refactoring for stability (VWAPS-157)
Handling of countries that do not exist (VWAPS-157)
Exception in entering another areacode (VWAPS-149)
Cleanup
Error cleaning up and testing
Deleting Numberblocks by sending delete messages per number
Deleting Numberblocks adds a script error
Cleanup of deleting xml transformations and testcases
Checking for incorrectly formatted accountnumbers
Splitup release in core and addon packages. (VWAPS-164)
Cleanup of unneeded scripts and services
Fax related services back
Hidden language setting for a new webuser because of duplicate
Patch level adjusted to support 1.4
LocalNumber back into the project
Verification script for local number updated
Update APS structure local number updated
Duplicate name in Channels was Error but could be done
Naming clash in Channels
FaxIn is simplified
FaxOut and FaxIn get a list of numbers to choose from
Naming extended
Mapping back to fields for numberlists where filled as areacode
Fix on faxout XSLT
Updated version with changed call resources
Dynamic resources for Voice Connect allowing payment for overuse
Optional fields added in global settings
Global setting for Billing Gateway supports an fixed URL to override it for testing
Fix removing bug from create script
Hard fix of country in Account to NL since it is the only country supported at the moment
Number selection from list removed for the first step for user interaction optimization
Added fill for dropdown list in Numbers
Option for converting resource usage values in seconds to minutes
Support for S3 feedback for sample billing reporting
Wholeseller account not part of branding information due to change in 1.5-4
Allow for empty username and password on mailserver without crashing SwitftMailer
APSMailer using one big Exception handler making mail sending all or nothing (and else ignore)
Fixed wholesale branding bug
Improved web-user configuration
Wholesaler URL added to branding
Branding fix
Entry points fixes
Reconfiguration not supported for Numbers
Name, Surname fixes
Removed api user. Only wholeseller user allowed
Branding
Resources script
Whitelabeling
Resource script cleanup
CSL call added to resource script
Updated documentation

setting.name: Enable branding
setting.description: Branding enabled. Don't disable.

setting.name: Identifier for the Platform owner for traceability and control.
setting.description: During APS embarkment this unique value should be supplied by Voiceworks.
setting.error-message: Please provide a valid identifyer as supplied by Voiceworks.

setting.name: Hostname of the Operator API
setting.description: Define the host name of the API only without http:// or https://
setting.error-message: Please provide a valid hostname for the Voiceworks Operator

setting.name: Hostname of the Billing Gateway
setting.description: Define the host name of the API only without http:// or https://
setting.error-message: Please provide a valid hostname for the Voiceworks Operator

setting.name: Convert seconds into minutes
setting.description: Allows for using minute pricing in POA. Entry values in seconds are converted to minutes

setting.name: Log-level
setting.description: The level that the log output should have.

setting.name: E-mail log delivery
setting.description: When logging information is supplied a mail will be sent

setting.name: Email from
setting.description: The sender in case of email logging
setting.error-message: An e-mail address is expected here
Vul een email adres in

setting.name: Email to
setting.description: The recipient in case of email logging
setting.error-message: An e-mail address is expected here
Vul een email adres in

setting.name: File log delivery
setting.description: When logging information is dumped to a file

setting.name: File log destination
setting.description: Full name and path where the log-file needs to be placed when used
setting.error-message: Please fill in a correct file path

setting.name: Console log delivery
setting.description: Logging information is dumped to the console. For development use only!

setting.name: SMTP server name
setting.description: The mail server name in case of sending email, i.e. logging
setting.error-message: Please fill in a correct host name

setting.name: SMTP server port
setting.description: The mail server port in case of sending email, i.e. logging
setting.error-message: Please fill in a valid port number

setting.name: Mail secure
setting.description: Determining if the connection must be secure in case of email logging

setting.name: SMTP user-name
setting.description: The user-name for sending in case of sending email, i.e. logging
setting.error-message: Please fill in a correct user-name

setting.name: SMTP password
setting.description: The password for sending in case of sending email, ie logging
setting.error-message: Please fill in a correct password

setting.name: Block execution
setting.description: This setting blocks execution of calls to the Voiceworks API

setting.name: vwe address
setting.description: full url of the csl location

setting.name: VW endpoint available.
setting.description: Leave this setting to false, unless a VW endpoint is available on your system.

setting.name: VWE cloud service layer admin user
VWE cloud service layer admin user

presentation.name: Customer
Customer
Klant
presentation.summary: Registration on the online switchboard

setting.name: Display name
setting.description: Needed to detect business or personal account

setting.name: Areacode
Areacode
Netnummer

Please select an areacode first and click Next
Selecteer eerst een netnummer en klik dan op Volgende

setting.name: Phone number
Phone number
Telefoonnummer

presentation.name: Managed Voice
presentation.summary: Managed Voice allows you to make use of a state-of-the-art telephone switchboard and facilities hosted by Voiceworks at a secure central location.
Managed Voice geeft u toegang tot een state-of-the-art telefooncentrale en faciliteiten bij Voiceworks op een beveiligde locatie.

setting.name: Extension number
Extension number
Extensie nummer
setting.description: Choose a numeric code between 100 and 899. 112 and 114 are not allowed
Choose a numeric code between 100 and 899. 112 and 114 are not allowed
Kies een getal tusen 100 en 899. 112 en 144 zijn niet toegestaan.

setting.name: Name
Name
Naam
setting.description: Name for the Managed Voice connection.
Name for the Managed Voice connection.
Naam voor de Managed Voice verbinding.

setting.name: Pincode
Pincode
Pincode
setting.description: Unique pincode of four digits.
Unique pincode of four digits.
Unieke pincode van 4 cijfers.
setting.error-message: Error in pincode, should be four digits only.
Error in pincode, should be four digits only.
Fout in pincode. Mag alleen 4 cijfers bevatten.

setting.name: Areacode
Areacode
Netnummer
setting.description: Areacode is used for 112 routing.
Areacode is used for 112 routing.
Netnummer wordt gebruikt voor de correcte routering van 112 meldingen
setting.error-message: Areacode incorrect, must be numeric and maximal 4 digits
Areacode incorrect, must be numeric and maximal 4 digits
Netnummer fout, moet maximaal 4 cijfers zijn

presentation.name: Voice Connect
presentation.summary: Voice Connect integrates your switchboard with the facilities hosted by hosted voice at a secure central location.
Voice Connect integrates your switchboard with the facilities hosted by Hosted voice at a secure central location.
Voice Connect koppelt de online diensten van Hosted voice met uw eigen telefooncentrale.
